subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s new rule that moves kickoffs from the 30- to the 35-yard line is likely to lead to fewer runbacks as the ball sails into the end zone.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s new rule that moves kickoffs from the 30- to the 35-yard line is likely to lead to fewer runbacks as the ball sails into the end zone.
